author: Staff Reporter
text:
It was started under JNNURM more than nine years ago

Coimbatore Corporation has decided to hasten the completion of the housing for urban poor project, BSUP (basic services for urban poor), which it had started under the Jawaharlal Nehru National Urban Renewal Mission more nine years ago. According to sources, Corporation Commissioner K. Vijayakarthikeyan asked officials in charge of the project to ensure it was completed between February 15 and 29. The Corporation’s urgency to complete the project comes in the wake of the State Government pointing out that the Central Government’s flagship scheme had been kept pending since 2007. The Corporation was supposed to have facilitated construction of 2,707 houses in the first phase.
title: Corpn. to speed up execution of BSUP scheme
